title: क्या झारखंड के मुख्यमंत्री रघुवर दास ने नशे में दिया इंटरव्यू? गलत दावा
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: I was clicked while I was rubbing my nose which is a common. I refute all the social media claims which wrongly state that I had covered my nose because of any undesirable smell.@dasraghubar@ceojharkhandpic.twitter.com/o7GzReDRJL
